name: MVB 2.11
desc: Your vision is filled with an array of monitors, desktops, and flesh. At this time in particular, first-year computer science students are having a C lab - the room is packed.

paths.name: Talk to a TA
paths.desc: You talk to a TA, who promptly tells you to go away.

paths.name: Turn on a computer
paths.desc: You turn on a computer and type in your username, but you've forgotten your password. What do you guess?

paths.name: dog123
paths.desc: The screen flashes red. You got it wrong!

name: Upper Atrium
desc: There are stressed students on several coloured sofas in this vast, open plain.

paths.name: Sit on a sofa
paths.desc: You sit down on a sofa and try to do some coursework with your friends. You end up talking to your friends for too long and don't get much accomplished.

rand_enc.desc: David May stops to have a chat with you about the Computer Architecture Computer. You waste 5 hours of time.
